workExperience.title: AI Engineer Intern
workExperience.roledesc: Enhancing enterprise-grade agentic AI systems by customizing frameworks like CrewAI, Autogen, and Langflow with modular components and control layers to support scalable, client-specific solutions. Building intelligent agent workflows using Langflow, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Chroma, MCPs, Composio, and LLMs to deliver flexible, production-ready architectures. Exploring and integrating no-code/low-code platforms to accelerate development and enable non-technical teams to contribute effectively. Managing backend infrastructure, implementing LLM observability and traceability, and optimizing pipelines to improve performance, decision transparency, and reliability in multi-agent environments.

workExperience.title: AI Engineer Intern
workExperience.roledesc: Led end-to-end development of scalable multi-agent AI systems using FastAPI, Python, LLMs, and vector databases, delivering modular, high-performance solutions for healthcare and surveying. Designed and deployed multimodal AI assistants with voice and text interfaces, reducing response latency by 28% and enhancing real-time engagement through optimized agent architecture. Optimized intelligent agents for behavior tracking and personalized content generation, cutting LLM costs by 12% via prompt optimization and model routing while boosting user retention. Automated extraction of healthcare insights from trusted sources like ClinicalTrials.gov and Amazon to generate accurate, user-centric care plans with minimal manual input. Authored comprehensive technical documentation covering APIs, agent behaviors, and backend systems to streamline onboarding, collaboration, and maintainability.
